title: Unable To play(BugSplat)
body: SO riot your recent patch from what I have read over on NA forums is the cause of my own and likely several others problems....You see a bunch of us now have 20 min leaver ques because your patch is faulty and causes us to crash when we join a game.We can pick our champs but as soon as the game starts BAM crash.Please fix this and kindly do something about the leave ques we have received due to this....fault?     {{item:3901}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)? Let me know if this helps.

Please test in a custom game to avoid any further penalties for leaving a matchmade game.
